code: import React from'react';import{ResponsiveContainer,LineChart,YAxis,XAxis,Line,Tooltip}from'recharts';import classes from'./LineGraph.module.css';var lineGraph=function lineGraph(props){var data=props.data;var lineChart=React.createElement(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:"100%"},React.createElement(LineChart,{data:data.data,margin:{top:10,right:20,left:20,bottom:10}},React.createElement(XAxis,{strokeWidth:"1px",stroke:'black',tick:{fontSize:'11px'},dataKey:'year'}),React.createElement(YAxis,{hide:true,tick:{fontSize:'12px'},type:"number",domain:[0,'dataMax']}),React.createElement(Tooltip,{cursor:{strokeWidth:0},content:renderTooltip,type:data.type}),React.createElement(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"value",strokeWidth:"3px",stroke:'#a70000',fill:"#a70000",activeDot:{r:10}})));return React.createElement("div",{className:classes.LineGraph},lineChart);};export default lineGraph;var renderTooltip=function renderTooltip(props){console.log(props.type);if(props.active&&props.payload!==null&&props.payload[0]!==null){var payload=props.payload[0].payload;var tooltip=null;switch(props.type){case'Upop':return tooltip=React.createElement("p",{className:classes.Tooltip},parseFloat(payload.value).toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g," ")," Inhabitants");break;case'Urbanlevel':return tooltip=React.createElement("p",{className:classes.Tooltip},parseFloat(payload.value).toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g," ")," %");break;case'NumAgllos':return tooltip=React.createElement("p",{className:classes.Tooltip},parseFloat(payload.value).toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g," ")," agglomerations");break;case'Mpop':return tooltip=React.createElement("p",{className:classes.Tooltip},parseFloat(payload.value).toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g," ")," Inhabitants");break;case'ADBA':return tooltip=React.createElement("p",{className:classes.Tooltip},parseFloat(payload.value).toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g," ")," km");break;}}};
